name: Carnival (itch)
description:
THIS GAME IS NOT SUITED FOR PLAYERS UNDER 14

INTRODUCTION

The game is based on a Chinese film "Angel wears white(2017)" which talks about the aftermath of a sexual assault to primary school students. This short game is about describing the incident itself ,through a metaphor in form of 2d game.

HOW TO PLAY

ARROW keys and SPACE for jump

ASSERT NOTES

Music generated from http://computoser.com/

A ambient from freesound.org

Some scene contains screenshot directly from the film.
